product_name: Sperry Top-Sider H2O Escape Bungee Water Shoes - Women's
long_description: Unload your kayak, traverse the rocky shore and spend the day on the water in the flexible Sperry H2O Escape Bungee Water Shoes for women. Amphibious, lightweight design weighs only 11.2 oz per pair. Adaptive Wave-Siping(TM) disperses water underfoot to enhance stability and reduce slippage on wet or dry surfaces. EVA midsoles with internal water channels are comfortable and durable, and they feature drainage to help feet dry more quickly. Removable perforated footbeds work with the internal water channels to allow water to escape faster and more efficiently. Uppers and linings promote fast drying. Adjustable bungees allow for secure wear and easy on and off.
short_description: Unload your kayak, traverse the rocky shore and spend the day on the water in the flexible Sperry H2O Escape Bungee Water Shoes for women.
